ygData.subject: RE: Tracking
ygData.msgSnippet: My husband has a ranger, and reads ranger related boards a lot. That is their number ONE complaint - they get TOO good, and the list is not sortable, you can t
ygData.messageBody:
My husband has a ranger, and reads ranger related boards a lot.

That is their number ONE complaint - they get TOO good, and the list is not
sortable, you can't ignore anything or sort it - and soon are getting
flooded with the whole zone of NPCs.

Tracking is the one skill I wish I had now, only lvl 23, I want tracking
nearly as much as I want our lvl 32 song.





At 11:51 AM 11/11/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>Hehe I been with rangers who wish they could track only as good as us! They
>dont like seeing crap that is clear across the zone andprefer to see stuff
>that is fairly close by. Guess Verant had a real "wizard" design ranger
>tracking.
